name: gc_wsi_bgseg
title: Tissue-Background segmentation in histopathological whole-slide images

summary.description: This algorithm segments the background in histopathological whole-slide images.

outputs.label: WSI Tumor and stroma segmentation mask
outputs.description: WSI tumor and stroma segmentation mask (MHA) used as first step in the pipeline. This segmentation mask was not validated, use it at your own risk! The labels are: 1-tumor, 2-stroma, 3-rest.

publications.title: Resolution-agnostic tissue segmentation in whole-slide histopathology images with convolutional neural networks

use.title: Intended use
use.text: This algorithm is a segmentation method of the background on whole-slide histopathology images. Ideally it uses a resolution of 2.0mm (TODO Should be verified!!!). The algorithm can also be found on Grand Challenge [1] (access upon request).

references.label: Algorithm on Grand Challenge (access upon request)

limitations.title: Limitations
limitations.text: This algorithm was developed for research purposes only.
